Field Summary
private  WeakHashMap<InventoryItem,ItemEffects> fxLib
          Caché of instantiated item effects for various items, set up such that they should expire when the items are unloaded from core by virtue of their weak references.

getSubversionRevision

public String getSubversionRevision()
Description copied from interface: HasSubversionRevision

Return the Subversion revision level of this class's source code file, as supplied via the special "$Rev: " sequence.

As an example,the Subversion revision string for this file is "$Rev: 1968 $" 

 
 @Override
 public String getSubversionRevision () {
        return "$Rev: ";
 }

Returns:
The Subversion revision level for this class's source code file.
See Also:
HasSubversionRevision.getSubversionRevision()
